main event: A sighting of an unidentified object reported during a baseball event in Spokane on July 31, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed to drift slowly for fifteen minutes., The report stated that the object appeared to be the size of a baseball held at arm's length., The object could potentially be classified as a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., The sighting lacked sufficient data for a definitive conclusion., The observation was made by a civilian.
sighted object: one unidentified object in the sky
